pages.text: $(li)The Desert is a dry biome mainly composed of Sand.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Even being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation, like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l), Poppies, Dandelions, Grass, Dead Bushes and, sometimes, Yucca trees.

$(li)Some animals can withstand these harsh conditions, such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/rattlesnake)Rattlesnakes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/tarantula_hawk)Tarantula Hasks$(/l).$(br)$(li)At night the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/husk)Husk$(/l) will be around the Desert too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Desert$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
